entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
